docTitle.titlePart: Incremental View Maintenance for Active Documents

front.div:
Abstract
In this paper, we develop algorithmic datalog-
based foundations for the incremental processing
of tree-pattern queries over active documents, i.e.
document with incoming streams of data. We de-
ne query satisability for such documents based
on a logic with 3-values: true, false forever,
and false for now. Also, given an active docu-
ment and a query, part of the document (and in
particular, some incoming streams) may become
irrelevant for the query of interest. We introduce
an incremental algorithm for detecting such use-
less data and streams, essential for implementing
garbage collection. We also provide complexity
analysis for the problems we study.
